verses.verse: A Song of the steps. When the Lord brought back the captivity of Sion; we were like them who are comforted.
Then was our mouth filled with joy, and our tongue with exultation; then did they say among the nations, “The Lord hath done great things for them.”
The Lord hath done great things for us; we are transported with rapturous joy.
Bring back, Lord, our captivity, like torrents in the south.
Let them who sow with tears reap with rapture.
They went step by step and wept sowing their seed; but let them come tripping with joy, carrying their sheaves.
